snippet: Annie Wang qualified as a master after winning the National Junior Chess Congress, but she might not hold the record for long.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column; 11-year-old Annie Wang becomes youngest American girl to ever become a chess master after winning the National Junior Chess Congress, but she might not hold the record for long.
lead_paragraph: Annie Wang qualified as a master after winning the National Junior Chess Congress, but she might not hold the record for long.

headline.main: At 11, New Master Breaks Record Older Than She Is
headline.print_headline: At 11, New Master Breaks Record Older Than She Is
